page.title: 08OUR SHOP
page.content: Our shop is a very small shop . It is a post office too. Up stairs there are paintings and there are lots of things down stairs like papers , note books,penicls, pens, milk, letters, cards, bread, butter, crisps, eggs, sausages, aprons, sugar, and ice cream.Mr and Mrs MacIntosh work in the shop.It opens at 9am.,closes for lunch at 1pm,reopens at 2pm and closes at 5pm. If we want to buy a lot of food we have to go to Oban where there are more shops. We can buy clothes in Oban too.Some people go to Oban once a month for masses of shopping. We fill the boot and the back of the car.
